column2: Bright sun- lite breeze out of NW- lots of cottonwood catkins floating on lake- water flowing freely out of north notch- ice out completely on April 15
Partly cloudy- strong NW wind- water flowing briskly from North notch.  Temperature probe gave error at depths greater than 60 feet.
Partly cloudy- hot- practically no rain in last month but lake level is normal.
Clear and windy.  Considerable rain has overflow going out North exit at a good rate.  Some point water cloudiness from runoff at new construction sites.
Partly cloudy- hazy- cold- snow and rain last week and a half
Mostly sunny- light breeze- black flies out- water running out of N notch
full sun- no breeze- lake is low no water out of N notch
full sun- we've had rain- lake is back up
